org.eclipse.viatra.integration.mwe2.mwe2impl

Class Conditional

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.integration.mwe2.mwe2impl.Conditional
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransformationStep

    public class Conditional
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITransformationStep
    Composite transformation step that implements an IF style conditional construction. The condition is specified by an IConditionProvider which enables the specification of dynamically evaluated conditions. If the condition evaluation returns true, the ifTrue step is executed, if otherwise, the ifFalse step is executed. Note: As the condition is evaluated runtime, both of the steps is initialized.
